Commentary: Shoaib Malik to Gayle, 2 runs, full and on middle, Gayle eases it through the covers. No power there, just a well-timed push
Shoaib Malik to Gayle, no run, Malik lands this on off and gets it to turn away, Gayle pokes towards point off an outside edge
Shoaib Malik to Gayle, FOUR, Gayle takes-off! Malik tosses this up, Gayle charges down the track and launches it over mid-on. One-bounce four

Shoaib Malik to Gayle, OUT, six and out! Gayle is gone. Malik strikes in his first over and nabs the big wicket. Flighted and spins away outside off, Gayle reaches out for a lofted hit. He makes a mess of it, skies it to Vince at long-on. Soft dismissal for Gayle. We won't see Amir v Gayle today
Wicket: ['CH Gayle c Vince b Shoaib Malik 6 (4b 1x4 0x6) SR: 150.00']

Commentary: Shoaib Malik to Azhar Ali, 1 run, flat on leg stump, picked away through midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run, drifts in, turns and climbs past the outside edge. Successful first over from Malik
Mohammad Amir to Azhar Ali, no run, full and slanting away outside off, driven to cover
Mohammad Amir to Azhar Ali, no run, full and wide outside off, Imad Wasim dives across to his right at point to stop this slash from the batsman
Mohammad Amir to Azhar Ali, no run, Malik now makes a smart diving stop to his right at mid-off. Overpitched and outside off, driven sweetly down the ground for none
Mohammad Amir to Azhar Ali, no run, full and angled in, defended back to the bowler
Mohammad Amir to Azhar Ali, FOUR, Azhar skips out, Amir pulls his length back outside off. He reaches out and smears it over point
Mohammad Amir to Azhar Ali, no run, down the track and lashed away to Wasim who is prowling in the covers
Shoaib Malik to Delport, 1 run, guided off the pads through backward square leg
Shoaib Malik to Azhar Ali, 1 run, the batsman uses his feet and clips it through midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Delport, 1 run, flighted on middle, driven smoothly to long-off
Shoaib Malik to Azhar Ali, 1 run, low full toss on middle and leg, whipped to cow corner
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run, Malik gets some quick spin, Delport jams his bat down on it
Shoaib Malik to Azhar Ali, 1 run, Azhar dances out and yorks himself. He manages to squeeze it through the off side
Mohammad Amir to Azhar Ali, FOUR, beats mid-on to his left. Length ball on middle, Azhar clears his front leg and powers it down the ground
Mohammad Amir to Azhar Ali, 1 leg bye, Amir retorts with a slower, short ball, which hits the thigh of Azhar. He did not wait for the ball to arrive. Pulled way too early
Mohammad Amir to Delport, 1 run, short ball on middle, punched to mid-on
Mohammad Amir to Azhar Ali, 1 run, back of a length and homing in on the off stump, Azhar waits for it and late-cuts it delicately to third man
Mohammad Amir to Delport, 1 run, inducker from Amir, inside-edged behind square

Mohammad Amir to Azhar Ali, FOUR, Azhar makes room and gallops down the track again, Amir shortens his length. But Azhar extends his arms and carves it away and pings the square boundary on the off side
Shakib Al Hasan to Delport, FOUR, full and on middle and leg, Delport sweeps it in the air over short fine leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Delport, no run, skiddy ball on middle, pushed to mid off
Shakib Al Hasan to Delport, 1 run, Delport sits back in the crease, loads up for a leg-side smite. But checks his shot and punches to long-on
Shakib Al Hasan to Azhar Ali, 1 run, slides in, chopped towards point on the back foot
Shakib Al Hasan to Delport, 1 run, darted onto the pads, punched past the diving bowler to long-on
Shakib Al Hasan to Azhar Ali, OUT, bowled'em! Arm-ball from Shakib. This snakes back in as Azhar steps out and does not lay bat on it. Shakib shoots through the gate and hits the furniture
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, no run, Delport shows the full face of the bat and drives this full one to mid-off
Wicket: ['Azhar Ali b Shakib Al Hasan 18 (16b 3x4 0x6) SR: 112.50']

Commentary: Sohail Tanvir to Delport, no run, back of a length and holds its line on off, clipped to midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, 1 run, short ball on the hips, swung away backward of square leg
Sohail Tanvir to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, full and outside off, scooped to mid-off
Sohail Tanvir to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, shortish on off, dabbed to cover on the back foot
Sohail Tanvir to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, back of a length and slides away with the angle, Rizwan gets on top of the bounce and punches it straight to the cover fielder
Shakib Al Hasan to Delport, 1 run, glanced off the pads through backward square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, drifts in, prodded to the covers off an outside edge
Shakib Al Hasan to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, Maqsood uses his feet, Shakib shortens his length and raps the pad
Shakib Al Hasan to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, laced through the covers
Shakib Al Hasan to Delport, 1 run, flat and fired on off, punched to long-off
Shakib Al Hasan to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, skids off the surface on off, patted to cover for a speedy single
Sohail Tanvir to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, back of a length on the stumps, punched past backward point
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, no run, short and tucks Delport up for room. Tucked towards midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, 1 run, Tanvir pulls pace off this incutter. Delport gets an inside edge that sneaks away behind square
Sohail Tanvir to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, banged in short and outside off, swivel-pulled off the middle to deep midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Delport, 1 run, more shoulder on this short ball outside off, Delport seeks to pull, he is rushed onto it. Top-edged hook, which lands just in front of fine leg
Sohail Tanvir to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, Tanvir floats a slower full toss, which is chipped down the ground
Imad Wasim to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, flat dart outside off, cut to short third man
Imad Wasim to Sohaib Maqsood, SIX, pushed through on middle, Maqsood attacks it and sends it over long-on. Short-armed away over the boundary
Imad Wasim to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, tossed up and drifts in, inside edged to leg
Imad Wasim to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, Maqsood skips out, this is bowled short and wide outside off. He reaches out and slaps it to cover
Imad Wasim to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, skids off the surface, straight on off, eased to long-off
Imad Wasim to Delport, 1 run, flat and quick around off, forced to long-off
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run, darted outside off, flash and a miss. This nearly shaved the off stump
Shoaib Malik to Delport, no run, full and on middle, reverse-slapped away to backward point. The fielder dives full-stretch to his right, but can't hang onto the chance
Shoaib Malik to Delport, 1 run, fullish, pushed to long-off

Shoaib Malik to Sohaib Maqsood, OUT, sliding across off from round the stumps, pushed to cover, Ahmed dives to his right, swoops down on the ball and fires an accurate throw to Malik who takes the bails off to catch Delport short
Shoaib Malik to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, flat and quick, hit back to the bowler
Shoaib Malik to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, keeps going away with the angle outside off, slapped to deep cover
Imad Wasim to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, width outside off, cut straight to point
Imad Wasim to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, fired outside off, this is cut through backward point
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, flat and on the leg stump, dug out
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, FOUR, flat and quick again, no turn, slog-swept forcefully over midwicket. Good hit from Rizwan
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, this one snakes in to catch the pad, but this was heading down leg
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, tossed up and outside off, eased to deep cover
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, full and outside off, creamed to the off-side sweeper

Bopara to Sohaib Maqsood, 3 runs, slower one outside off, the batsman wants to lap it away. He can only top-edge it over short fine leg. They scamper across for the third run. Maqsood makes his ground at the bowler's end with a full-length dive
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, loopy full toss on off, swatted to deep midwicket
Bopara to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, short and slow on middle, the batsman drags a pull in front of square
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, Bopara rolls his fingers across this full ball outside off, run away to the right of the keeper who dives to collect the ball
Bopara to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, back of a length offcutter, pushed back to the bowler
Shakib Al Hasan to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, Shakib comes back and drifts it in, driven to mid-on
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, flat and quick, swept firmly through backward square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Sohaib Maqsood, 1 run, down the track and whipped to long-on
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, Rizwan goes for another sweep, tickled behind square off an inside edge
Shakib Al Hasan to Sohaib Maqsood, 2 runs, the batsman steps out and gets a full toss, which is sliced to point

Shakib Al Hasan to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, the keeper fluffs a stumping chance. Maqsood leaves his crease, Shakib may have held this back further. The batsman is yorked and misses the ball. So does Bangash
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, down the track and quietly dead-batted
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, FOUR, down the track, this one is lofted over the bowler's head; one-bounce four. Clean strike from Rizwan, bisecting long-off and long-on
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, the batsman makes room and skips out, Wasim chases him and keeps it to a dot
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, drifts in and rips past the groping bat. Beautiful ball
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, slides on outside off, punched through point

Imad Wasim to Sohaib Maqsood, OUT, Maqsood wants to attack Wasim. He dances out and scoops it to backward point. Bopara tracks back, moves to his right, and pouches the catch at the cover-point region
Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run, tossed up and comes in, dropped defensively to leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, 1 run, slides on off, wristy push past the covers accompanied by some flourish
Wicket: ['Sohaib Maqsood c Bopara b Imad Wasim 22 (27b 0x4 1x6) SR: 81.48']

Commentary: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, pushed through on off, Rizwan goes low and sweeps well through backward square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, 1 run, skiddy ball, cut from the stumps on the back foot to sweeper cover
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, another sweep shot through backward square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, FOUR, looped up outside off, Bravo brings out a banana-peel slash over the covers. The flourish was even better here
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, pitched up on off, swept through backward square again. Rizwan loves this shot
Imad Wasim to Bravo, no run, short of a length on off, punched to cover
Imad Wasim to Bravo, 1 run, helped off the pads to short fine leg
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, SIX, Rizwan gallops down the track and clears long-on. He goes low to get the elevation. Swung away over the fielder
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, tapped to the off side for one
Imad Wasim to Bravo, no run, slides on middle, forced to cover
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, full and slants away outside off, flash and a miss
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, FOUR, low full toss outside off, drilled drive past the covers for four
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, full and angled straight, picked away through midwicket
Mohammad Amir to Bravo, 2 runs, pitched up and angled in, stylishly driven past extra-cover
Mohammad Amir to Bravo, 1 run, back of a length on the hips, turned only to short fine leg
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, full and pacy on the stumps, driven down the ground
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Rizwan, 2 runs, angled in full on middle, squeezed through midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, full and outside off, back-of-the-hand slower one it is, the batsman glides it towards backward point with an open face
Sohail Tanvir to Bravo, 1 run, short of a length and outside off, Bravo backs away a touch and slices it to third man
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, banged in outside off, swat-pulled away to deep midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Bravo, no run, slower one, almost a yorker outside off, tricks Bravo and beats him
Sohail Tanvir to Bravo, 1 run, full and outside off, Bravo throws his bat and slices it to third man
Mohammad Amir to Bravo, 2 runs, too full and outside off, Bravo flashes a couple to third man. He wanted to launch it over extra cover, but sliced it away off an outside edge

Mohammad Amir to Bravo, OUT, The middle stump is tilted back. First wicket for Amir in the PSL. This was a straight back of a length ball, Bravo tunes up for a big leg-side slog but only connects with a whole lot of thin air

Mohammad Amir to Zohaib Khan, OUT, twin-strike for Amir! Full again, no swing, the new batsman shuffles across and scoops it straight into the gloves off the keeper. Zohaib sent back for a golden duck. Bangash does not make any mistake here

Mohammad Amir to Cooper, OUT, Cooper is also out for a duck. Amir takes the first hat-trick of the PSL, in the second match. This was nice and full on middle, Cooper falls over the push, plays all round it, and is pinned in front. Amir celebrates and is greeted by his team-mates
Mohammad Amir to Naved Yasin, 1 leg bye, sliding into the pads, misses the flick
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, pretty full and outside off, jabbed to extra-cover. Yasin drifts out for a single but is sent back. The fielder misses the direct hit
Sohail Tanvir to Naved Yasin, 1 run, slower short ball on middle, rides it to short third man
Wicket: ['Zohaib Khan c †Saifullah Bangash b Mohammad Amir 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, Tanvir nails an accurate yorker, squirted out
Sohail Tanvir to Naved Yasin, 1 run, shortish on middle, swung away over midwicket
Wicket: ['KK Cooper lbw b Mohammad Amir 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Rizwan, 2 runs, he shuffles across and laps it delicately over the keeper

Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Rizwan, OUT, this time, the batsman laps it onto the stumps. Looks like Rizwan has a love-hate relationship with the sweep, much like India's Dinesh Karthik. He shuffles across off only to deflect this full ball onto the stumps
Sohail Tanvir to Zafar Gohar, 1 leg bye, full on middle, Gohar wants to launch it over midwicket. He can't lay bat and takes it on the pad
